articles.description: FIFA are reportedly set to risk infuriating clubs including Liverpool and Man City because of their international fixtures in March
articles.content: Liverpool and several clubs around the Premier League and beyond could be forced to play crucial fixtures without some of their major stars because of rules surrounding upcoming international matches… [+2357 chars]
